A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This has left viewers polarized in much the same way that \"Empire Strikes Back\" did so many years ago.  I was left on the edge of my seat several times\, the storyline itself gripped me (though there were some elements of cheese - it is Star Wars\, after all)\, and I can't wait to see it again!  Mark Hamill may well be part of an Oscar nomination campaign...and Carrie Fisher's appearance takes on a new poignancy.
